posts.post_content:
[Palladium Myr](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Palladium Myr) + 2x [Myr Galvanizer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Myr Galvanizer) + Pentavus + [Parallel Lives](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Parallel Lives).   
Activate infinite mana loop for infinite Pentavite tokens and an Infinite power/Infinite toughness Pentavus.  
  
Then, just for fun, throw in an [Overwhelming Stampede](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Overwhelming Stampede).
posts.html:
Palladium Myr + 2x Myr Galvanizer + Pentavus + Parallel Lives.

Then, just for fun, throw in an Overwhelming Stampede.

posts.post_content:
This was one of my favorite surprises from the Elspeth and Tezzeret dual decks and I'm pleased to see that I can now play it in standard.  
  
The card screams for proliferate which is already a cherished mechanic of mine so I'm hoping to have some good fun with this marvellous caterpillar of doom.
posts.html:
This was one of my favorite surprises from the Elspeth and Tezzeret dual decks and I'm pleased to see that I can now play it in standard.

The card screams for proliferate which is already a cherished mechanic of mine so I'm hoping to have some good fun with this marvellous caterpillar of doom.

posts.post_content: From here on out, I'm automatically .5/5'ing any *Doubling Season* comment I come across.
